## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withSchema() method

Define a component schema.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withSchema(name: string, schema: SchemaObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the schema |
|  schema | <code>SchemaObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the schema |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
